segments.text: Can I speak to Miss Cooper please ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Would you hold on a second , please ? Miss Cooper's extension is engaged .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Engaged . Oh , dear ! Could you tell her it's a long-distance call ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm sorry , sir . I can't interrupt her . I'm sure she won't be very long .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How long do you think she'll be ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I really can't say how long she'll be .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can I leave a message , please ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can you tell her I'm waiting to speak to her ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , sir . I'll ring her on an inside line if you like .
segments.speaker: S1
